short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a GitHub button to the Graphite Code Review UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currently, Graphite doesn't provide an easy way to get to github from the graphite code review ui. This extension adds a button along the right-hand side to immediately jump to github.
